scripts.cap:copy: npm run prepare:web && npx cap copy android
scripts.cap:sync: npm run prepare:web && npx cap sync android
scripts.ios:sync: npm run prepare:web && npx cap sync ios
scripts.android:apk:debug: npm run cap:sync && cd android && ./gradlew assembleDebug
scripts.android:bundle:debug: npm run cap:sync && cd android && ./gradlew bundleDebug
scripts.android:bundle:release: npm run cap:sync && cd android && ./gradlew bundleRelease
